DOC.brief_summary: An evaluation of a preterm infant formula containing ingredients similar to those found in breastmilk
DOC.criteria: Birthweight 5001800 g Less than 33 wks gestational age Enteral feeding initiated by 21 days of life Asymmetrical smallforgestational age (SGA) infants and infants with patent ductus arteriosus (PDA) are eligible to participate Singleton or twin births only Infant is 21 days of age or less at time of randomization Serious congenital abnormalities that may affect growth and development Grade III or IV intraventricular hemorrhage (IVH) Maternal incapacity History of major surgery Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) Asphyxia Confirmed NEC or positive blood cultures at the time of randomization
